headline: Jim Cramer on Marsh & McLennan Companies, Inc. (MMC): ‘They Just Keep Raising Rates’
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Jim Cramer Discussed 18 Companies That Hit $100 Billion in Market Cap in 2024.
